name: archetype_leak_test
description: Test whether the missed-value-bet leak (~4.5% for Bob Ross) is personality-specific or archetype-specific. Uses different characters in the same archetypes as the option_order_test baseline: 2x LAG, 1x borderline, 1x tight-passive.
hypothesis: If Ebenezer Scrooge (tight_passive, aggr=0.2) shows a similar leak rate to Bob Ross (tight_passive, aggr=0.1), the leak is archetype-driven. If not, it's Bob Ross's personality prompt overriding EV signals.
